name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a results-driven Senior Sales Engineer with a robust background in business development and project management, I excel in driving CRM initiatives and enhancing customer relationships to optimize sales strategies. With 8 years of experience, I have honed my communication skills and proposal management expertise, enabling me to effectively address client needs in diverse environments including water treatment, filtration, softening, reverse osmosis, dewatering, and wastewater treatment.
My technical acumen, combined with a deep understanding of the industry, allows me to leverage data-driven insights to guide customer decision-making processes. I have led successful projects, ensuring alignment with customer requirements, driving both satisfaction and retention. My proactive approach in developing business opportunities has consistently resulted in increased revenue. Beyond my technical knowledge, I am committed to fostering strong partnerships and facilitating solutions that meet compliance and operational standards.
